site_name: Site known as Stratford Waterfront (also known as East Bank)bound by the Waterworks River to the southwestLondon Aquatics Centre and F10 Bridge to the southeastand Carpenters Road to the north and east.
description: Submission of details pursuant to discharge Conditions S.5 (Fencing), D.4 (Environmental Manager), D.6 (Construction Environmental Management Plan), D.7 (Construction Transport Management Plan), D.8 (Site Waste Management Plan), D.10 (Construction Dust), D.11 (Construction Noise and Vibration), D.12 (Surface and Foul Water Drainage) of planning permission 18/00470/OUT (as amended) dated 25th July 2019, for the development known as Stratford Waterfront.
